creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: village in a valley near mountains; church with other stone buildings and a stream near center; golden rolling hills with shrubs in foreground and LL; rising golden bluff in background with towering blue and white mountain behind
markings: LLC, red artist\'s seal G: (Edelweiss floral pattern)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series known as Europe
title: Matterhorn
